Text: Does anyone know how to use the AdobeCS6PatchHostsFile? Do you copy it into Terminal? Or do I have to find and edit the hosts file directly?

Thx acesandeights for your work.
I'm not familiar with Apple scripts & Automator... ;)

There will be no conflicts between them ?

Downloaded and installed CS6 L16 from previous torrent and everything worked except for Illustrator which is stuck on TRY (when I look at the About Illustrator splash it says TRY version also), so uninstalled and attempted this Patch, following the instructions, but still no luck, even renamed the .png as suggested and that didn't work either.
Does anyone have any suggestions for getting Illustrator to fully activate ( this is my MAIN app )? I'm getting worried that I may lose the app after 30 days.
Thanks for the patch by the way, I know it's most likely something I did.
Don't forget to install Little Snitch to also prevent apps from "phoning home."
Anyway this will work on windows or if you can upload one for windows?

@TVeye246. I had the same problem when I dl the master collection. When the spash shows up it shows as Tryout. Uninstall and install it again and the same thing shows up. So I disconnect from the internet first, uninstall and install it for the 3rd time. Once installed, I copied the [K'ed]amtlib.framework and replace the original amtlib file in CS6 Illustrator Contents>Frameworks folder. Start Illustrator and the Tryout is gone when the splash window shows up. You might want to try that.
@acesandeights. Thank you very much for this activation patch.
to seamonk55, just double click the AdobeCS6PatchHostsFile, its an Applescript application, it'll write the info in your hosts file for you then open it so you can see.

Hey ILLUSTRATOR friends - I think that TRYOUT screen its just a mistake - all programs works fine - but you have to copy THE HOLE FOLDER - nos just that file. The only program thats says TRYOUT its Illustrator - don't ask me why! The installation and all the process must be done OFFLINE!!
